name: 重生轮回/Reborn Not Again
description:
Reborn Not Again is a kind of horizontal-action passing game, where players control characters to collect and upgrade weapons, in order to defeat the dark forces and save this world out of balance. However, maybe it is just a reincarnation?

Feature:
A unique way to control weapons without the character
Five worlds with various levels in different styles
The weapon itself is out of physical form and exists in the form of energy
Post-scenes need to pass with pre-story clues
Nine kinds of weapons can be obtained from the near-melee to the long-range
Operations need to take both combat and mobile into accounts
Players can get props that produce different gain effects during the game.
